name: AP_CLAIM_IF_FIN_MCC_FLAG
description: Indicates if the diagnosis was a complication or comorbidity (CC) or major complication or comorbidity (MCC) for final Diagnosis Related Grouper (DRG) assignment.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DX_FINAL_CC_OR_MCC_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates if the diagnosis was a complication/comorbidity or major complication/comorbidity for final Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) assignment.
